name: JLRFractal: Mandelbrot/Julia Generator
short_description: JLRFractal is a Mandelbrot/Julia generator written in C++ using Trolltech's Qt graphics libraries.  It features an easy-to-use zoom feature and a speed-up technique that is visible to the user.  Color cycling features as well as saving to file are also
